text:
Need Sophie Anderson for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $23,241, looking for 1 x Twitter post, 2 x Podcast guest, 1 x 2-minute tutorial. 7 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 3 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $23,241 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
